q: President Bush focused on a war with Iraq almost immediately after the Sept. 11, 2001 terror attacks. ''He asked that I take a look at the shape of our military plans on Iraq,'' Donald Rumsfeld writes. He wanted the options to be ''creative.'' Posted by: Liam-still| February 3, 2011 11:42 AM| mike: Here ya go. Eypt has been relocated! Fox News graphics department has shaky grasp of Mideast geography

WINDSOR, Ontario- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. ''We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Assemblyman Jeff Kartye works on a 2011

a judge has upped the unpredictability factor of a popular show that had become highly predictable, the producers of American Idol already find themselves in the position of choosing to apologize to the viewing public for the rocker's outrageous Simon Cowell who? Steven Tyler re-invigorates ''Idol' Newsvine- There were differing opinions on how season 10 of ''American Idol would look this year, but almost everyone agreed on two points: ''Idol''' would sorely miss the irreplaceable Simon Cowell , and few would notice the absence of Ellen DeGeneres after her disappointing season as the fourth judge.

So I'm sure that he's made a discernment that this is the right move. Former Rep. David McIntosh, who preceded Mike Pence in the 2nd District, said Mike Pence 's decision was the correct one ''because he made it.'' ''You've got

B-movie actor, turned governor, turned candidate. He gave voice to the ideals and values that I was raised to believe in.'' Republicans, Mike Pence continues, should learn from how Ronald Reagan led. I think Ronald Reagan personifies both the substance and the style of conservatism in the 21st century, he says. Management Centers Chrysler to 25 percent from the 20 percent it previously held. However, Fiat Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne recently revealed that the two companies could eventually become indistinguishable if they were to merge into one entity. From a corporate governance standpoint, there's a point where separate companies make no sense, Sergio Marchionne told Renault. Before the two companies could merge however, Fiat and Chrysler need to meet a series of objectives as defined by the U.S. government during Chrysler's 2009 bankruptcy

repays others who invest in U.S. Treasury bonds. ''It's an IOU that is backed by Treasury bonds and the faith and credit of the United States government,'' said Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt. It is the same faith and credit that enables us to borrow from rich people and from China and from other countries. As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor.
